title: Potential energy of cylinder-Earth system changes

content.question: As the cylinder rolls down the ramp, how do the potential energy of the cylinder-Earth system and the kinetic energy of the cylinder change, if at all?

choices.label: Potential Energy of Cylinder-Earth System Kinetic Energy of Cylinder Stays the same Increases
Potential Energy of Cylinder-Earth SystemKinetic Energy of CylinderStays the sameDecreases
Potential Energy of Cylinder-Earth SystemKinetic Energy of CylinderDecreasesIncreases
Potential Energy of Cylinder-Earth SystemKinetic Energy of CylinderDecreasesDecreases

content.answer: Potential Energy of Cylinder-Earth SystemKinetic Energy of CylinderDecreasesIncreases

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
